txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from Caivád Sâr. They have seen a fortress of Angmarim and banners of the Iron Crown hung from every wall! Had my scouts more time, they would have disrupted the Angmarim there. Instead, they ran into strange stones within the fortress and could not scout any further.

'Caivád Sâr is a deadly fortress and is not a place to tread lightly!'
Your mission is to destroy Iron Crown standards and lesser watching stones in the tower of Caivád Sâr.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Caivád Sâr.
Monsters in this mission will apply a corruption buff to nearby allies.
You have been tasked with destroying the mark of the Iron Crown that inhabits the tower of Caivád Sâr.
Complete Mission: The Watchers of Iron
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to TBD.'
'Well done! With the banners and watching stones destroyed, we should be able to launch an assault against Caivád Sâr soon enough!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

Far from Angmar, the last stronghold of the Iron Crown keeps watch over Elderslade for the forces of Gundabad….\n\nYour mission is to destroy Iron Crown standards and lesser watching stones in the tower of Caivád Sâr.
